const char* nitf_Directory_findNextFile (  nitf_Directory *  dir  ) 
 

Opens the next file in a directory. This call should be made after a call has been already made to findFirstFile

Parameters:
dir The directory object to operate on
Returns:
The name of the next file in the directory, or NULL if none
